lead_paragraph: The English and math exams given to third- through eighth- grade students will no longer be timed, the State Education Department said, ending the call of “pencils down.”

headline.main: New York Will Shed Clock for Some Statewide Tests

snippet: The English and math exams given to third- through eighth- grade students will no longer be timed, the State Education Department said, ending the call of “pencils down.”
abstract: New York State Education Dept announces that statewide exams in English and math given to third- through eighth-grade students will no longer be timed.
